    scaled_df = scaler.fit_transform(df)
    return scaled_df

df = pd.DataFrame(tuples_list, columns=columns)
    scaler = StandardScaler()
    scaled_df = df.copy()
    for col in columns:
        scaled_df[col] = scaler.fit_transform(scaled_df[col].values.reshape(-1, 1))
    return scaled_df

df = pd.DataFrame(tuples_list, columns=columns)

    scaled_df = scaler.fit_transform(df)
    return pd.DataFrame(scaled_df, columns=df.columns)

df = pd.DataFrame(data=tuples_list, columns=columns)
    scaler = StandardScaler()
    scaled_df = scaler.fit_transform(df)
    return scaled_df

tuples = tuples_list
    df_scaled = pd.DataFrame(columns=columns)

    for i in range(len(tuples)):
        data = pd.Series(tuples[i])
        scaler = StandardScaler()
        df_scaled.at[i, columns] = scaler.fit_transform(data.values.reshape(1, -1))
    return df_scaled

df = pd.DataFrame(tuples_list, columns=columns)
    scaler = StandardScaler()
    for col in df.columns:
        df[col] = scaler.fit_transform(df[[col]])
    return df

# Create a DataFrame from the input tuples
    df = pd.DataFrame(tuples_list, columns=columns)

    # Perform a default scaling on each column using the StandardScaler
    scaler = StandardScaler()
    df_scaled = scaler.fit_transform(df)

    # Return the transformed DataFrame
    return df_scaled

df = pd.DataFrame(tuples_list, columns=columns)

    scaler = StandardScaler()
    scaler.fit(df.loc[:, columns])
    df_scaled = scaler.transform(df.loc[:, columns])
    return df_scaled

# create a dataframe
    df = pd.DataFrame(tuples_list, columns=columns)

    # perform scaling on each column
    scaler = StandardScaler()
    scaled_columns = scaler.fit_transform(df)
    df_scaled = pd.DataFrame(scaled_columns, columns=columns)

    # return the transformed dataframe
    return df_scaled

df = pd.DataFrame(tuples_list, columns=columns)
    scaler = StandardScaler()
    for i in range(len(columns)):
        scaler.fit(df[[columns[i]]])
        df[columns[i]] = scaler.transform(df[[columns[i]]])
    return df
